scripts.install-dependencies: cd ../../shared/transforms-ts && yarn install && yarn run build && cd ../tests-common && yarn install && yarn run build && cd ../../packages/ts-nameof
scripts.create-links: symlink-dir ../../shared/transforms-ts/dist src/external/transforms-ts && symlink-dir ../../shared/tests-common/dist src/external/test-common && symlink-dir ../../shared/common/dist src/external/common
scripts.prepare: yarn run install-dependencies && yarn run create-links
scripts.test: tsc --build && yarn run --silent copy-test-files && nyc --reporter=lcov mocha --opts mocha.opts
scripts.create-declaration-file: ts-node --project tsconfig.scripts.json scripts/generation/main create-declaration-file && yarn run --silent verify-declaration-file
scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json src/**/*.ts && tslint -c tslint.scripts.json scripts/**/*.ts
scripts.dopublish: yarn run create-declaration-file && yarn run lint && yarn run test && yarn run build && npm publish --otp
